section.description: This is a useful feature for creating alphabets using international characters. Like other labels in Alpha Anywhere it is possible to insert HTML directly into the property textbox. To create HTML using a WYSIWYG (What you see is what you get), you can go to View at the top of the screen and open the HTML editor from the dropdown.
